channel.title: Compiling
channel.description:
I've opened up my source, I've edited somethings, and when it comes to compiling it, it just won't go through!
The error is when I compile is the following :
"javac" is not recognized as an external or internal command, operable program, or batch file.
I figure it means I don't have the Java Development Kit, but I have the latest version!
Can someone please help me out?

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @Genecide Genecide
item.description:
@Genecide wrote:

Thanks, it’s fixed now.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @shorty_5855 shorty_5855
item.description:
@shorty_5855 wrote:

ok you might need to fix the compiler so right click it and put edit the erase everything and replace it with this @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause then also you might have JDK 6U1 instead of JDK 6.0 so if that is the case then go to this link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,112632.0.html and do that to fix it if not then you should be set hope that helps

Read full topic
